subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVvqt66DGNBMW83lw5Q9hQ7YPW7Wb0M15FT8QvN4sL4dz5n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3mlN7x01NjKjm4LW1wYH8Q3jxnH2W3FW5cG70pkzGW7nJhdg28z1KsW6GJ9sc9gn7pqW1gVJQ875hs4WW4BGllR1vzBZNW1hlc2Y88hX-LW3s31L531BPjLW72r1HK5QKNH8W7hvZNc8ZYwfhW7Kz3Lf1V2782W82NxLw4PpT4DW8wHMmJ5RxWMJW53c99V6SQTL2W7yYh6V14xSyzW491dnp49gF-9N5S2BQ2b05ymW1C1tdc2PDY4_W8NLfBW4wC82KW1y6ts63ZlmYDW6Vrnrr4DF8snW2WQ-yF8JrJHZVSkmCQ8YMhqjW12FwL54t6Vt5W7Vql_55t1Gr9N1HRRzdWrK63N6PrQZK75KzdN16zfKsCQldVW41jmtS1sYFHQMxTK4-JM_l0W5Fd2nY6lV7VNW4QvFDc4vx-CqW1VQ6K55lcHtcVBdWC68BsQnQV2PX5n1PBVNmW8WKKzr2PVqSbW7z94Bx1-N_kkW7GBJPH7NVl4rW2FvK6Z785914W87fqkY7BVLyHW4TnbW_4ncxkjf28c7lW04 )

Hey Atto,

Another week, another lineup packed with ideas worth your clicks. Here’s your quick look at what’s new from Athos Commerce.

From conversion-driving insights in our on-demand webinar with industry experts to future-focused reads like Grow 25: Volume 4 and the 2025 Tech Stack Playbook, this week’s lineup is built for smarter growth. Plus, get CEO Chuck Haling’s take on where we’re headed - and see how River Island’s seeing results in action.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team



Featured This Week

? NEW Ebook | Grow 25: Volume 4 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVvqt66DGNBMW83lw5Q9hQ7YPW7Wb0M15FT8QvN4sL4dz3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3pTW31c15M1SnbYsW3QbzC16ddcBfW4jxWn-1wmh0PN6LL7DlDxmwTW7k6MXm9cT8xJVKm_2w1glKkMW6v4C2t4vD2wtW3xQZyH7-p9G3W21X7155HWX9wW99Y_dy74wl4BW4G0JPR85tPgyW8Vp2Nn7LmHZjW7Qw5s95tdk1TW1R1GcD1rYryPW91-8-l3RlFsVW5j1s3_7PThy7W3G8yJv7lbv-_W821LSr1KHTh5VjpsQr80wCfrW4NgplL1Vls4VW27G8GB10MTqbN7bgJ9C6nvRLW8cb_Z_11100DW38X3r76pNWzBW84MDFT1RtkDyN4gXxzRXzXKWf7t8b5v04 )

Technology is reshaping roles, redefining consumer expectations, and accelerating change faster than ever. Read insights from industry experts to understand the evolving relationship between humans, machines, and markets and what it means for the future of work and commerce.
